etymology.description: semantic 氵(氵) (shuǐ, "water") + phonetic 尃(尃) (fū, "spread") = water-like spreading -> widespread
etymology.interpretation: The character 溥(pǔ, "widespread") combines 水(shuǐ, "water") as the semantic component, indicating something spreading out like water, and 尃(fū, "spread") as the phonetic component, reinforcing the idea of expansion and dissemination.
